    "**Prepare the Ricotta Filling:** In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.",
    "**Cook Noodles:** Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.",
    "**Assemble Lasagna:** Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F). Spread a thin layer of Bolognese sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Layer with 4 noodles, half of the ricotta mixture, half of the remaining Bolognese, and one-third of the mozzarella.",

    "Top with the final 4 noodles and the remaining mozzarella cheese.",
    "**Bake:** Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for another 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving."

title: Spinach and Mushroom Lasagna
ground_truth:

  "ingredients": [
    "12 lasagna noodles",
    "1 tablespoon olive oil",
    "250g sliced mushrooms",
    "2 cloves garlic, minced",
    "280g frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry",
    "500g ricotta cheese",

    "Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).",

    "In a separate bowl, mix the ricotta cheese, egg, and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.",
    "Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.",
    "**Assemble Lasagna:** Spread a thin layer of marinara sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Layer with 4 noodles, half of the ricotta mixture, half of the spinach/mushroom mixture, and one-third of the mozzarella.",
    "Repeat the layer: 4 noodles, the rest of the ricotta, the rest of the spinach/mushroom mixture, and one-third of the mozzarella.",
    "Top with the final 4 noodles, the remaining marinara sauce, and the remaining mozzarella cheese.",
    "**Bake:** Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for another 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving."
  ]
}
